name: St.Michae`s Golden-Domed Cathedral
generalDescription: The commemorative coins are dedicated to the restoration of St.Michael`s Golden-Domed Cathedral, historical and architectural monument of Rus-Ukraine of 12th-18th centuries
averseDescription: On the obverse of all the coins from this series within the frame made of a vegetal ornament of the Eucharist mosaic there is depicted the small National Emblem of Ukraine and the inscriptions: on the gold coin - УКРАЇНА, 100 ГРИВЕНЬ, 1998 (Ukraine/ 100/hryvnia/1998) and the designation of the metal- Au 900, its fineness, and 15,55, the coin weight in fineness; on the silver coin - УКРАЇНА, 10 ГРИВЕНЬ, 1998 (Ukraine/ 10/hryvnia/1998) and the designation of the metal- Ag 925, its fineness, and 31,1, the coin weight in fineness; on the German silver coin - УКРАЇНА, 5 ГРИВЕНЬ 1998 (Ukraine/ 5 /hryvnia/1998)
reverseDescription: On reverse of all the coins from this series against the background of the picture of the St.Michael`s Golden-Domed Cathedral, there are the silhouettes of the twelve apostles from the symbolic communion scene of the Eucharist mosaic. On the coin there is the circular inscription: МИХАЙЛІВСЬКИЙ ЗОЛОТОВЕРХИЙ СОБОР XII СТ. (St.Michael`s Golden-Domed Cathedral of the 12th century)
